<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs=""
>
[Improved Command Corpse](/Feats.aspx?ID=3886) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Corpse Tender](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=196)

**Prerequisites**
[Command Corpse](/Feats.aspx?ID=3884)

</column>

---

When you use [Command Undead](/Feats.aspx?ID=277) on a [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160), if the undead succeeds at its save but doesn't critically succeed, it becomes your [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) for 1 round. If the undead fails its save, it becomes your minion for 1 hour. If it critically fails, it becomes your minion for 24 hours.
name: Improved Command Corpse
